(1995) in Electronics Engineering, M.Sc. (1999) and Ph.D. (2004) degrees in Computer Engineering from 9 Eylül University, İzmir Institute of Technology and Ege University, respectively. He worked as research fellow in INRIA Rhone-Alpes in 2005. In addition to his administrative duties, he also manages the Dependable Components and Systems Lab in our department. His current research interests are: Formal Methods for Software Testing Testing of Hardware Components and System-on-Chip Real-Time and Fault-Tolerant Embedded Systems B.Sc. : Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Dokuz Eylul University (1995) M.Sc. : Computer Engineering, Izmir Institute of Technology (1999) Ph.D. : Computer Engineering, Ege University (2004) CoursesPublicationsProjectsCourses CENG 215 - Circuits and Electronics CENG 312 - Computer Networks CENG 383 - Real-Time Systems CENG 523 - Advanced Topics of Real Time Systems CENG 525 - Fault Tolerant Computing Publications 2021 Uras Tos;
